channel.title: Keys on zerodivisible.io
channel.description: Recent content in Keys on zerodivisible.io

item.title: GPG Keys
item.description: From time to time I have a need to work with GPG keys - (i.e. when dealing with third party interfaces and encrypting files to be send). Usually keys which I’m using are being delivered to me - but especially when developing (& testing), I have a need to go back to command line and use gpg from within it. As each time when I’m doing so, I have to either read man for GPG or use Google, I just thought that I will put some of the most common things which I’m using in the blog post.
